dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 1085 IH: To repeal the Prevention and Public Health Fund.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Pitts introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To repeal the Prevention and Public Health Fund.

section.header: Repealing Prevention and Public Health Fund

subsection.text: Section 4002 of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (42 U.S.C. 300u–11) is repealed.
Of the funds made available by such section 4002, the unobligated balance is rescinded.

subsection.header: Notice of Rescission of Unobligated Funds
subsection.text: Not later than 10 days after the date of the enactment of this Act, the Secretary of Health and Human Services shall post on the public website of the Department of Health and Human Services a notice of—

paragraph.text: the rescission, pursuant to subsection (b), of the unobligated balance of funds made available by such section 4002; and
the amount of such funds so rescinded.
